Pnc Bank routing numbers are also known as as ABA numbers, routing transit numbers (RTN), or check routing numbers. Routing numbers depend on the type of transaction made such as reorder Pnc Bank checks, receive incoming domestic or international wire transfers, use the number for wire transfers to your Pnc Bank account, or to set up direct deposits.
